mainApp.title: Junk News Aggregator - Explorer
mainApp.header: Junk News Aggregator
mainApp.homeDescription:
Explorer

This interactive tool shows junk news stories posted publicly on Facebook. The term “junk news” is defined in our methodology.
mainApp.archiveDescription: This archive shows junk news stories posted on Facebook more than 24 hours ago. The term “junk news” is defined in our methodology.
mainApp.footer: DISCLAIMER: This aggregator identifies "junk news" sites based on a grounded typology tested in several scientific studies conducted by the COMPROP research group. It reflects our scientific opinion and evaluation (the basis of opinion is described in our methodology), and does not necessarily reflect the views of our funders or the University of Oxford.

top10MiniApp.title: Junk News Aggregator - Daily Top 10 List
top10MiniApp.header: Junk News Aggregator
top10MiniApp.description:
Daily Top 10 List

This list shows the top 10 junk news stories posted on Facebook in the last 24 hours. It is updated daily at 5pm ET. It shows the top 10 posts in terms of the total number of reactions they have received per second of their life, from time posted to time retrieved by our system (i.e. the "age-adjusted total: All" metric). Please see the methodology section for more details, including how the term "junk news" is defined. This is a smaller version of the main Explorer.
top10MiniApp.footer: DISCLAIMER: This aggregator identifies "junk news" sites based on a grounded typology tested in several scientific studies conducted by the COMPROP research group. It reflects our scientific opinion and evaluation (the basis of opinion is described in our methodology), and does not necessarily reflect the views of our funders or the University of Oxford.
